<h1>Movies</h1>

I love watching movies. I am a proud owner of an [Odeon membership](https://www.odeon.co.uk), (which I stronly suggest to any UK-resident movie lover). I am also happy to pass along [a list of good movies](https://www.theyshootpictures.com/gf1000_rank1-1000.htm) which was indicated to me from a dear cinephilic friend.

If you want to follow my film-watching, you can [add me on Letterboxd](https://letterboxd.com/conj34/) (it's like a Facebook for movies, super nice website).
